me.soxey6.engine.managers.event
Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
  me.soxey6.engine.managers.event.EventManager

public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for dispatching, hooking and managing events. It is effective at creating efficient and optimized calls to other classes and objects.
